sqlMap.sql:
select cpid, sum(if(ads_state=1 and substr(enddate, 1,8)>curdate()+0,1,0)) readycnt, sum(if(ads_state=2,1,0)) bookcnt, sum(if(ads_state=3,1,0)) runcnt, sum(if(ads_state=5,1,0)) completecnt, sum(if(ads_state=0,1,0)) pausecnt, sum(if(ads_state=-1,1,0)) stopcnt, sum(if(ads_state=-2 or (ads_state=1 and substr(enddate, 1,8)<=curdate()+0),1,0) ) cancelcnt, sum(1) totcnt, max(adsid) max_adsid from ads
cpid = #cpid#
group by cpid

case when ifnull(runcnt ,0) > 0 then 3 when ifnull(bookcnt ,0) > 0 then 2 when ifnull(readycnt ,0) > 0 then 1 when ifnull(completecnt ,0) > 0 then 5 when ifnull(pausecnt ,0) > 0 then 0 when ifnull(stopcnt ,0) > 0 then -1 when ifnull(cancelcnt ,0) > 0 then -2 when ifnull(totcnt ,0) = 0 then -3 else 0 end cp_state
sqlMap.select:
select x.*, y.isname as cp_statename, y.text from (select a.cpid, a.cpname, a.startdate, a.enddate, case when ifnull(runcnt ,0) > 0 then 3 when ifnull(bookcnt ,0) > 0 then 2 when ifnull(readycnt ,0) > 0 then 1 when ifnull(completecnt ,0) > 0 then 5 when ifnull(pausecnt ,0) > 0 then 0 when ifnull(stopcnt ,0) > 0 then -1 when ifnull(cancelcnt ,0) > 0 then -2 when ifnull(totcnt ,0) = 0 then -3 else 0 end cp_state, a.clientid, c.corpname as clientname, a.agencyid, g.corpname as agencyname, a.medrepid, r.corpname as medrepname, a.tcid, t.username as tcname, a.budget, a.insertdate, a.updatedate, a.insertuser, a.updateuser, u.username as updateusername from campaign a left join (
) b on a.cpid = b.cpid left join corporation c on a.clientid = c.corpid and c.corptype = 1 left join corporation g on a.agencyid = g.corpid and g.corptype = 2 left join corporation r on a.medrepid = r.corpid and r.corptype = 3 left join users t on a.tcid = t.userid left join users u on a.updateuser = u.userid where a.stat = 1 a.startdate >= $start$ a.enddate <= $end$ group by a.cpid ) x left join code_instance y on y.code = 'ads_state' and x.cp_state = y.isid
cp_state = $cp_state$ $sch_column$ like '%$sch_text$%'
order by x.cpid
limit $skip$,$max$

select x.*, y.isname as cp_statename, y.text from (select a.cpid, a.cpname, a.startdate, a.enddate, case when ifnull(runcnt ,0) > 0 then 3 when ifnull(bookcnt ,0) > 0 then 2 when ifnull(readycnt ,0) > 0 then 1 when ifnull(completecnt ,0) > 0 then 5 when ifnull(pausecnt ,0) > 0 then 0 when ifnull(stopcnt ,0) > 0 then -1 when ifnull(cancelcnt ,0) > 0 then -2 when ifnull(totcnt ,0) = 0 then -3 else 0 end cp_state, ifnull(max_adsid,0) as max_adsid, a.clientid, c.corpname as clientname, a.agencyid, g.corpname as agencyname, a.medrepid, r.corpname as medrepname, a.tcid, t.username as tcname, a.budget, a.insertdate, a.updatedate, a.insertuser, a.updateuser, u.username as updateusername from campaign a left join (
) b on a.cpid = b.cpid left join corporation c on a.clientid = c.corpid and c.corptype = 1 left join corporation g on a.agencyid = g.corpid and g.corptype = 2 left join corporation r on a.medrepid = r.corpid and r.corptype = 3 left join users t on a.tcid = t.userid left join users u on a.updateuser = u.userid where a.cpid = #cpid# ) x left join code_instance y on y.code = 'ads_state' and x.cp_state = y.isid
select a.corpname as label, a.corpid as value, a.corpname as id from adsrv.corporation a where stat = 1 and corptype = $corptype$ order by corpname
select a.code, a.isid, a.isname, text, isdefault from code_instance a inner join code_entity b on b.tbname = '$tbname$' and a.code = b.code where a.stat = 1 a.code = '$code$' order by code, a.idx

insert into adsrv.campaign (cpid, cpname, startdate, enddate, clientid, agencyid, medrepid, aeid, budget, tcid, stat, insertdate, updatedate, insertuser, updateuser) values (0, '$cpname$', '$startdate$', '$enddate$', $clientid$, $agencyid$, $medrepid$, $aeid$, '$budget$', $tcid$, 1, '$insertdate$', '$insertdate$', $insertuser$, $insertuser$);
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
sqlMap.update: update adsrv.campaign set cpname = '$cpname$', startdate = '$startdate$', enddate = '$enddate$', clientid = $clientid$, agencyid = $agencyid$, medrepid = $medrepid$, aeid = $aeid$, budget = '$budget$', tcid = $tcid$, stat = $stat$, updatedate = $updatedate$, updateuser = $updateuser$ where cpid = $cpid$;
sqlMap.select: select adsid, a.adsname, a.startdate, a.start_hour, a.start_min, a.enddate, a.end_hour, a.end_min, a.goaltype, a.period, a.salestype, a.prtype, a.budget, a.book_total, a.goal_total, a.goal_daily, a.ads_state, st.isname as ads_statename, st.text, a.insertuser, a.insertdate, a.updateuser, u.username as updateusername, a.updatedate from adsrv.ads a left join users u on a.updateuser = u.userid left join code_instance st on st.code = 'ads_state' and a.ads_state = st.isid where a.stat = $stat$ and a.cpid = $cpid$

select cpid, adsid, a.adsname, a.startdate, a.start_hour, a.start_min, a.enddate, a.end_hour, a.end_min, a.realenddate, a.period, a.goaltype, g.isname as goaltypename, a.salestype, s.isname as salestypename, a.prtype, p.isname as prtypename, a.ads_state, st.isname as ads_statename, st.text, a.budget, a.book_total, a.goal_total, a.goal_daily, a.insertuser, a.insertdate, a.updateuser, u.username as updateusername, a.updatedate from adsrv.ads a left join users u on a.updateuser = u.userid left join code_instance p on p.code = 'prtype' and a.prtype = p.isid left join code_instance g on g.code = 'goaltype' and a.goaltype = g.isid left join code_instance s on s.code = 'salestype' and a.salestype = s.isid left join code_instance st on st.code = 'ads_state' and a.ads_state = st.isid where a.adsid = $adsid$
sqlMap.insert:
insert into adsrv.ads (adsid, adsname, cpid, startdate, start_hour, start_min, enddate, end_hour, end_min, realenddate, stime, etime, goaltype, period, salestype, prtype, budget, book_total, goal_total, goal_daily, ads_state, stat, insertuser, insertdate, updateuser, updatedate ) values (0, #adsname#, #cpid#, #startdate#, #start_hour#, #start_min#, #enddate#, #end_hour#, #end_min#, #realenddate#, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(STR_TO_DATE(#startdate#, '%Y%m%d %H%i')), UNIX_TIMESTAMP(STR_TO_DATE(#realenddate#, '%Y%m%d %H%i')), #goaltype#, #period#, #salestype#, #prtype#, #budget#, #book_total#, #goal_total#, #goal_daily#, 1, 1, #insertuser#, #insertdate#, #insertuser#, #insertdate# );
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
sqlMap.update: update adsrv.ads set adsname = '$adsname$', startdate = '$startdate$', start_hour = '$start_hour$', start_min = '$start_min$', enddate = '$enddate$', end_hour = '$end_hour$', end_min = '$end_min$', goaltype = $goaltype$, period = $period$, salestype = $salestype$, prtype = $prtype$, budget = '$budget$', book_total = '$book_total$', goal_total = '$goal_total$', goal_daily = '$goal_daily$' ads_state = $ads_state$, stat = $stat$, updateuser = $updateuser$, updatedate = now() where adsid = $adsid$ ;
sqlMap.select:
select x.*, y.`isname` as cr_statename, y.text from ( select a.`crid`, a.`crname`, a.`clientid`, b.`corpname` as clientname, a.`prtype`, t.isname as prtypename, a.`crtype`, a.width, a.`height`, a.`crurl`, max(ifnull(c.`cr_state`,0)) cr_state, a.insertdate, a.insertuser, a.updatedate, a.updateuser, u.username as insertusername from creative a left join ads_creative c on a.crid = c.crid left join corporation b on a.clientid = b.corpid left join code_instance t on t.code = 'prtype' and a.prtype = t.isid left join users u on a.updateuser = u.userid where a.stat = 1 and c.cr_state = $cr_state$ and width = $width$ and height = $height$ and substr(a.insertdate, 1, 8) between '$sday$' and '$eday$' and a.prtype = $prtype$ and a.crtype = $crtype$ $sch_column$ like '%$sch_text$%' group by a.crid ) x left join code_instance y on y.code = 'cr_state' and x.cr_state = y.isid order by updatedate desc
limit $skip$,$max$ ;

select count(distinct a.crid) from creative a left join ads_creative c on a.crid = c.crid left join corporation b on a.clientid = b.corpid left join code_instance t on t.code = 'prtype' and a.prtype = t.isid where a.stat = 1 and c.cr_state = $cr_state$ and width = $width$ and height = $height$ and substr(a.insertdate, 1, 8) between '$sday$' and '$eday$' and a.prtype = $prtype$ and a.crtype = $crtype$ $sch_column$ like '%$sch_text$%'

select a.`adsid`, c.adsname, a.`crid`, b.crname, b.width, b.height, b.prtype, t.isname as prtypename, a.startdate, a.start_hour, a.start_min, a.enddate, a.end_hour, a.end_min, a.weight, a.updatedate, a.updateuser, u.username as updateusername, a.cr_state, st.isname as cr_statename from ads_creative a left join creative b on a.crid = b.crid left join ads c on a.adsid = c.adsid left join code_instance t on t.code = 'prtype' and b.prtype = t.isid left join code_instance st on st.code = 'cr_state' and a.cr_state = st.isid left join users u on a.updateuser = u.userid where c.cpid = $cpid$ and a.adsid = $adsid$ ;
sqlMap.insert:
insert into adsrv.creative (crid, crname, clientid, crtype, crurl, width, height, richmedia, prtype, stat, insertdate, insertuser, updatedate, updateuser )values ( 0, '$crname$', $clientid$, $crtype$, '$crurl$', $width$, $height$, '$richmedia$', $prtype$, 1, '$insertdate$', $insertuser$, now(), $insertuser$ );
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()

( #List[].crid# , 0 , #List[].clickname# , #List[].clickurl# , now() , #List[].updateuser# , 1 )
sqlMap.update: update adsrv.creative set crname = '$crname$', agentid = $agentid$, crtype = $crtype$, crurl = '$crurl$', width = $width$, height = $height$, richmedia = '$richmedia$', isprism = $isprism$, stat = $stat$, updateuser = $updateuser$, updatedate = now() where crid = $crid$;

update adsrv.ads_has_creative set startdate = $startdate$, enddate = $enddate$, weight = $weight$, cr_state = $cr_state$, stat = $stat$, updatedate = now(), updateuser = $updateuser$ where adsid = $adsid$ and crid = $crid$
sqlMap.insert: insert into adsrv.ads_has_slot (adsid, slotid, slot_state, insertdate, insertuser, updatedate, updateuser) values ($adsid$, $slotid$, 0, '$insertdate$', $insertuser$, now(), $insertuser$ );
sqlMap.update: update adsrv.ads_has_slot set slot_state = $slot_state$, stat = $stat$, updatedate = now(), updateuser = $updateuser$ where adsid = $adsid$ and slotid = $slotid$;
sqlMap.select: select a.entno, a.entname, tname, tseq, tvalue, x.text from (select a.code, a.isid, a.isname, text, isdefault from code_instance a inner join code_entity b on b.tbname = 'target' and a.code = b.code where a.stat = 1 and a.code = 'targettype' and isid = $targettype$ ) x left join target_entity a on x.isid = a.targettype left join target_evalue b on a.entno = b.entno

select a.targettype, i.isname as targettypename, a.tid, a.targetname, a.updateuser, u.username as updateusername, a.updatedate from target a left join users u on a.updateuser = u.userid left join code_instance i on i.code = 'targettype' and i.isid = a.targettype where a.stat = 1 and a.targettype = $targettype$ $sch_column$ like '%$sch_text$%' order by $order_str$ , a.updatedate desc
limit $skip$,$max$ ;

select a.`adsid`, c.adsname, b.targettype, i.isname as targettypename, b.tid, b.targetname, a.updatedate, a.updateuser, u.username as updateusername from ads_targeting a left join target b on a.targetid = b.tid left join ads c on a.adsid = c.adsid left join code_instance i on i.code = 'targettype' and i.isid =b.targettype left join users u on a.updateuser = u.userid where b.stat = 1 and c.cpid = $cpid$ and a.adsid = $adsid$

select a.targettype, i.isname as targettypename, a.tid, a.targetname, b.targetid from target a left join ads_targeting b on b.adsid = $adsid$ and a.tid = b.targetid left join code_instance i on i.code = 'targettype' and a.targettype = i.isid where a.stat = 1 order by i.idx, a.updatedate desc

select count(*) from target a left join users u on a.updateuser = u.userid left join code_instance i on i.code = 'targettype' and i.isid = a.targettype where a.stat = 1 and a.targettype = $targettype$ $sch_column$ like '%$sch_text$%'

insert into adsrv.ads_slot ( adsid, slotid,seq, slot_state, insertdate, insertuser, updatedate, updateuser, stat ) select $adsid$, slotid, 0, 1, $insertdate$, $insertuser$, $insertdate$, $insertuser$, 1 from slotgroup_slot where groupid = $groupid$ and stat = 1 and slotid not in (select slotid from ads_slot a where a.adsid = $adsid$)

insert into adsrv.target (tid, targetname, targettype, updatedate, updateuser, stat ) values (0, '$targetname$', $targettype$, now(), $updateuser$, 1);
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
sqlMap.update: update adsrv.target set targetname = '$targetname$', stat = $stat$, updatedate = now(), updateuser = $updateuser$ where tid = $tid$;
sqlMap.select: select a.targettype, i.isname as targettypename, a.tid, a.targetname, i.text as targetmenu, a.updateuser, u.username as updateusername, a.updatedate from target a left join users u on a.updateuser = u.userid left join code_instance i on i.code = 'targettype' and i.isid = a.targettype where a.stat = 1 and a.tid = $tid$
select a.tid, a.targetname, a.targettype, freqday, freqcap, day, browser, time from target a left join target_system b on a.tid = b.tid where a.tid = $tid$
select a.tid, a.targetname, a.targettype, idx, ip_from, ip_to, ip_alias from target a inner join target_ip b on a.tid = b.tid where a.tid = $tid$ and b.stat = 1 order by idx
select a.tid, a.targetname, a.targettype, category from target a inner join target_category b on a.tid = b.tid where a.tid = $tid$

select a.tid, a.targetname, a.targettype, b.`excflag`, b.`slotid`, s.secid, s.siteid from target a inner join target_channel b on a.tid = b.tid left join slot s on b.slotid = s.slotid where a.tid = $tid$
select tid, idx, channelid, channelname from target_channel_id a where tid = $tid$ and stat = 1 order by idx

select a.tid, a.targetname, a.targettype, b.excflag, country1, country2, country3, country4, country5, country6, country7, country8 from target a inner join target_country b on a.tid = b.tid where a.tid = $tid$
